00114             function                __construct()
00115             {
00116                   try
00117                   {
00118                         $this->PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00119                         $this->PermitAlgorithms = get_package( 'permit::permit_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00120                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00121                         $this->UserAccess = get_package( 'user::user_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00122                         $this->UserAlgorithms = get_package( 'user::user_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00123                         
00124                         $Settings = get_package( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00125                         $Settings->load_package_settings( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , 'cf_site' );
00126                         $this->EnableRegistration = intval( $Settings->get_setting( 'enable_registration' , 1 ) );
00127                         $this->RegistrationConfirm = intval( $Settings->get_setting( 'registration_confirm' , 1 ) );
00128                         $this->EmailSender = $Settings->get_setting( 'email_sender' , $this->EmailSender );
00129                         $this->SystemEmail = $Settings->get_setting( 'system_email' , $this->SystemEmail );
00130                   }
00131                   catch( Exception $e )
00132                   {
00133                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00134                   }
00135             }

00184             function                redirect_after_login( &$Options )
00185             {
00186                   try
00187                   {
00188                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'redirect_after_login' , false ) )
00189                         {
00190                               $RedirectPage = $Options->get_setting( 'redirect_page' , false );
00191                               
00192                               if( $RedirectPage === false )
00193                               {
00194                                     $Settings= get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00195                                     $Settings->load_file( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_user_controller' );
00196                                     
00197                                     $RequestUri = $this->Security->get_srv( 'REQUEST_URI' , 'string' );
00198                                     
00199                                     $RedirectPage = $Settings->get_setting( 'redirect_page' , $RequestUri );
00200                               }
00201                               
00202                               header( 'Location: '.$RedirectPage );
00203                               exit( 0 );
00204                         }
00205                   }
00206                   catch( Exception $e )
00207                   {
00208                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00209                   }
00210             }

00281             function                process_login_errors( $UserExists , $UserActive , $AuthValid )
00282             {
00283                   try
00284                   {
00285                         if( $UserExists == false )
00286                         {
00287                               $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00288                               $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'user_does_not_exists' );
00289                         }
00290                         elseif( $UserActive == false )
00291                         {
00292                               $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00293                               $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'registration_was_not_confirmed' );
00294                         }
00295                         elseif( $AuthValid == false )
00296                         {
00297                               $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00298                               $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'authentification_error' );
00299                         }
00300                   }
00301                   catch( Exception $e )
00302                   {
00303                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00304                   }
00305             }

00329             function                do_login( $UserLogin , &$Options )
00330             {
00331                   try
00332                   {
00333                         $User = $this->UserAccess->get_user( $UserLogin );
00334                                           
00335                         if( $this->UserAlgorithms->user_banned( $UserLogin ) )
00336                         {
00337                               $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00338                               $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'user_is_banned_to '.$User->banned_to );
00339                               return;
00340                         }
00341                         
00342                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00343                         
00344                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_before_login' , array( 'id' => get_field( $User , 'id' ) ) );
00345                         
00346                         $this->UserAlgorithms->login( $UserLogin , get_field( $User , 'id' ) );
00347                         
00348                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_login' , array( 'id' => get_field( $User , 'id' ) ) );
00349                         
00350                         $this->redirect_after_login( $Options );
00351                   }
00352                   catch( Exception $e )
00353                   {
00354                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00355                   }
00356             }

00376             function                login( $Options )
00377             {
00378                   try
00379                   {
00380                         $UserLogin = $this->Security->get_gp( 'login' , 'string' );
00381                         $UserPassword = $this->Security->get_gp( 'password' , 'string' );
00382                         
00383                         $UserExists = $this->UserAlgorithms->user_exists( $UserLogin );
00384                         $UserActive = $AuthValid = true;
00385                         
00386                         if( $UserExists )
00387                         {
00388                               $UserActive = $this->UserAlgorithms->user_active( $UserLogin );
00389                         
00390                               if( $UserActive )
00391                               {
00392                                     $AuthValid = $this->UserAccess->validate_auth( $UserLogin , $UserPassword );
00393                                     
00394                                     if( $AuthValid )
00395                                     {
00396                                           $this->do_login( $UserLogin , $Options );
00397                                     }
00398                               }
00399                         }
00400                         
00401                         $this->process_login_errors( $UserExists , $UserActive , $AuthValid );
00402                   }
00403                   catch( Exception $e )
00404                   {
00405                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00406                   }
00407             }

00459             function                activate_user( $Options )
00460             {
00461                   try
00462                   {
00463                         if( $this->EnableRegistration === 1 )
00464                         {
00465                               $Hash = $this->Security->get_gp( 'hash' , 'command' );
00466                               $this->UserAccess->activate_user( $Hash );
00467                               
00468                               $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00469                               $PageComposer->add_success_message( 'user_was_activated' );
00470                         }
00471                   }
00472                   catch( Exception $e )
00473                   {
00474                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00475                   }
00476             }

00496             function                update_user( $Options )
00497             {
00498                   try
00499                   {
00500                         $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_user();
00501                         
00502                         $Login = get_field( $User , 'login' );
00503                         $UserEmail = $this->Security->get_gp( 'email' , 'email' );
00504                         $Site = $this->Security->get_gp( 'site' , 'string' , '' );
00505                         $About = $this->Security->get_gp( 'about' , 'string' , '' );
00506                         
00507                         $this->UserAccess->update_user( $Login , $UserEmail , $Site , $About );
00508                         
00509                         if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'current_password' , 'set' ) )
00510                         {
00511                               $CurrentPassword = $this->Security->get_gp( 'current_password' , 'string' );
00512                               if( strlen( $CurrentPassword ) )
00513                               {
00514                                     if( $this->UserAccess->validate_auth( $Login , $CurrentPassword ) )
00515                                     {
00516                                           $Password = $this->Security->get_gp( 'password' , 'string' );
00517                                           $PasswordConfirmation = $this->Security->get_gp( 'password_confirmation' , 'string' );
00518                                           if( $Password == $PasswordConfirmation )
00519                                           {
00520                                                 $this->UserAccess->reset_password( $Login , $Password );
00521                                           }
00522                                     }
00523                               }
00524                         }
00525                         
00526                         $this->PageComposer->add_success_message( 'user_update_was_completed' );
00527                   }
00528                   catch( Exception $e )
00529                   {
00530                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00531                   }
00532             }

00552             function                register_user( $Options )
00553             {
00554                   try
00555                   {
00556                         if( $this->EnableRegistration === 1 || 
00557                               $this->PermitAlgorithms->object_has_permit( false , 'user' , 'user_manager' ) )
00558                         {
00559                               $PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00560                               $UserLogin        = $this->Security->get_gp( 'login' , 'string' );
00561                               $UserEmail        = $this->Security->get_gp( 'email' , 'string' );
00562                               $UserPassword     = $this->Security->get_gp( 'password' , 'string' );
00563                               $Name                   = $this->Security->get_gp( 'name' , 'string' );
00564                               $Sex              = $this->Security->get_gp( 'sex' , 'integer' );
00565                               $Site                   = $this->Security->get_gp( 'site' , 'string' , '' );
00566                               $About                  = $this->Security->get_gp( 'about' , 'string' , '' );
00567                               
00570                               if( $this->UserAlgorithms->user_exists( $UserLogin ) )
00571                               {
00572                                     $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'user_already_exists' );
00573                                     return;
00574                               }
00575                               
00578                               if( $this->UserAccess->email_exists( $UserEmail ) )
00579                               {
00580                                     $PageComposer->add_error_message( 'email_already_exists' );
00581                                     return;
00582                               }
00583                               
00584                               $PermitAccess = get_package( 'permit::permit_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00585                               $ActivationHash = $this->UserAccess->register_user( 
00586                                     $UserLogin , $UserPassword , $UserEmail , $Name , $Sex , $Site , $About
00587                               );
00588                               $User = $this->UserAccess->get_user( $UserLogin );
00589                               $PermitAccess->add_permit_for_object( 'public' , get_field( $User , 'id' ) , 'user' );
00590                               $PermitAccess->add_permit_for_object( 'registered' , get_field( $User , 'id' ) , 'user' );
00591                               $CachedFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00592                               
00595                               if( $this->RegistrationConfirm && 
00596                                     $this->Security->get_p( 'active_permanently' , 'command' , false ) !== 'on' )
00597                               {
00600                                     $EmailTemplate = $CachedFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'confirm_registration_email.tpl' );
00601                                     $EmailTemplate = str_replace( 
00602                                           '{server_name}' , $this->Security->get_srv( 'SERVER_NAME' , 'string' , 'localhost' ) , 
00603                                           $EmailTemplate
00604                                     );
00605                                     $EmailTemplate = str_replace( 
00606                                           '{http_host}' , $this->Security->get_srv( 'HTTP_HOST' , 'string' , '127.0.0.1' ) , 
00607                                           $EmailTemplate 
00608                                     );
00609                                     $EmailTemplate = str_replace( '{hash}' , $ActivationHash , $EmailTemplate );
00610                                     $EmailTemplate = $this->PageComposer->execute_processors( $EmailTemplate , 'post_process' );
00611                                     $Headers  = 'MIME-Version: 1.0'."\r\n";
00612                                     $Headers .= 'Content-type: text/html; charset=utf-8'."\r\n";
00613                                     $Headers .= 'From: '.$this->EmailSender.' <'.$this->SystemEmail.'>'."\r\n";
00614 
00615                                     mail( 
00616                                           $this->Security->get_gp( 'email' , 'string' ) , 'Confirm registration' , 
00617                                           $EmailTemplate , $Headers
00618                                     );
00619                               }
00620                               else
00621                               {
00624                                     $this->UserAccess->activate_user( $ActivationHash );
00625                                     $this->RegistrationConfirm = false;
00626                               }
00627                               
00628                               $this->RegistrationWasPassed = true;
00629                               
00630                               $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00631                               $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_register_user' , array( 'login' => $UserLogin ) );
00632                               
00633                               if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'back_page' , 'command' , false ) !== false )
00634                               {
00635                                     $this->Security->reset_s( 'success_message' , 'user_was_created' );
00636                                     header( "HTTP/1.1 301 Moved Permanently" );
00637                                     header( "Location: ./".$this->Security->get_gp( 'back_page' , 'command' ).'.html' );
00638                               }
00639                         }
00640                   }
00641                   catch( Exception $e )
00642                   {
00643                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00644                   }
00645             }

00665             function                set_avatar( $Options )
00666             {
00667                   try
00668                   {
00669                         $FileInputController = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_controller' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00670                         
00671                         if( $FileInputController->UploadedFile )
00672                         {
00673                               $User = $this->UserAlgorithms->get_user();
00674                               
00675                               $Avatar = get_field( $User , 'avatar' );
00676                               if( $Avatar > 0 )
00677                               {
00678                                     $FileInputAccess = get_package( 'file_input::file_input_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00679                                     $FileInputAccess->delete( $Avatar );
00680                               }
00681                               
00682                               $Login = get_field( $User , 'login' );
00683                               $FileId = get_field( $FileInputController->UploadedFile , 'id' );
00684                               $this->UserAccess->set_avatar( $Login , $FileId );
00685                         }
00686                   }
00687                   catch( Exception $e )
00688                   {
00689                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00690                   }
00691             }

00711             function                controller( $Options )
00712             {
00713                   try
00714                   {
00715                         $Context = get_package( 'gui::context' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00716                         
00717                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_login' );
00718                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
00719                         
00720                         if( $this->UserAlgorithms->logged_in() === true )
00721                         {
00722                               $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_logout' );
00723                               if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
00724                         }
00725                         
00726                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_update_user' );
00727                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
00728                         
00729                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_activate_user' );
00730                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
00731                         
00732                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_registration_form' );
00733                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
00734                         
00735                         $Context->load_config( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_user_set_avatar' );
00736                         if( $Context->execute( $Options , $this ) )return;
00737                   }
00738                   catch( Exception $e )
00739                   {
00740                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00741                   }
00742             }
